1.0.5.name: wordpress/secontactverificationform
1.0.5.description: SE Contact Verification Form comes with mobile number verification functionality combining OTP (One-Time Password) with our Wordpress SE Contact Form. We integrated wordpress contact form with https://www.isms.com.my/ mobile number verification tools to validate all incoming enquiries and prevent spams through SMS. SE Contact Verification Form supports CAPTCHA for additional spam filtering and comes with predefined contact form fields as well as additional custom text fields. Bulk SMS from isms.com.my covers more than 800 mobile operators worldwide, you are able to send SMS to Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Brunei, <
